Package address.data

Class AddressBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • address.data.AddressBook
  • public class AddressBook
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides functionalities to manage an address book, including adding, removing, listing, and finding address entries. Entries are organized and sorted by last name.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AddressBook()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void add​(AddressEntry entry)

      Lists all address entries in the address book to the console, sorted by last name.

      Loads address entries from a specified file into the address book.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddressBook

        public AddressBook()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(AddressEntry entry)
        Adds an address entry to the address book. If the last name does not already exist in the book, a new TreeSet is created. Entries are sorted by last name.
        Parameters:
        entry - The AddressEntry object to be added to the address book.

      • list

        public void list()
        Lists all address entries in the address book to the console, sorted by last name. Each entry is printed on a new line.

      • remove

        public void remove​(java.lang.String lastName)
        Removes all entries with the specified last name from the address book.
        Parameters:
        lastName - The last name of the entries to be removed.

      • readFromFile

        public void readFromFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        Loads address entries from a specified file into the address book. The file should contain address entry data in a comma-separated format. This method will parse each line into an AddressEntry object and add it to the address book.
        Parameters:
        filename - The path of the file from which to load address entries.

      • find

        public java.util.TreeSet<AddressEntry> find​(java.lang.String startOf_lastname)
        Finds and returns a set of address entries whose last names start with the specified prefix. The returned set is sorted by last name.
        Parameters:
        startOf_lastname - The prefix of the last name to search for.
        Returns:
        A TreeSet of AddressEntry objects matching the search criteria.
